trans-unit.source: Aether Vial
trans-unit.target: Aether Vial

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a charge counter on Æther Vial. {T}: You may put a creature card with converted mana cost equal to the number of charge counters on Æther Vial from your hand onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a charge counter on Æther Vial. {T}: You may put a creature card with converted mana cost equal to the number of charge counters on Æther Vial from your hand onto the battlefield.

trans-unit.source: Black Vise
trans-unit.target: Black Vise

trans-unit.source: As Black Vise enters the battlefield, choose an opponent. At the beginning of the chosen player's upkeep, Black Vise deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of cards in his or her hand minus 4.
trans-unit.target: As Black Vise enters the battlefield, choose an opponent. At the beginning of the chosen player's upkeep, Black Vise deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of cards in his or her hand minus 4.

trans-unit.source: Isochron Scepter
trans-unit.target: Isochron Scepter

trans-unit.source: Imprint — When Isochron Scepter enters the battlefield, you may exile an instant card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your hand. {2}, {T}: You may copy the exiled card. If you do, you may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: Imprint — When Isochron Scepter enters the battlefield, you may exile an instant card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your hand. {2}, {T}: You may copy the exiled card. If you do, you may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

trans-unit.source: Ivory Tower
trans-unit.target: Ivory Tower

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain X life, where X is the number of cards in your hand minus four.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain X life, where X is the number of cards in your hand minus four.

trans-unit.source: Valuing scholarship above all else, the inhabitants of the Ivory Tower reward those who sacrifice power for knowledge.
trans-unit.target: Valuing scholarship above all else, the inhabitants of the Ivory Tower reward those who sacrifice power for knowledge.

trans-unit.source: Jester's Cap
trans-unit.target: Jester's Cap

trans-unit.source: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Jester's Cap: Search target player's library for three cards and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.
trans-unit.target: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Jester's Cap: Search target player's library for three cards and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

trans-unit.resname: V10·6 | Karn, Silver Golem | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Karn, Silver Golem
trans-unit.target: Karn, Silver Golem

trans-unit.resname: V10·6 | Karn, Silver Golem | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever Karn, Silver Golem blocks or becomes blocked, it gets -4/+4 until end of turn. {1}: Target noncreature artifact becomes an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its converted mana cost until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: Whenever Karn, Silver Golem blocks or becomes blocked, it gets -4/+4 until end of turn. {1}: Target noncreature artifact becomes an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its converted mana cost until end of turn.

trans-unit.source: Masticore
trans-unit.target: Masticore

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Masticore unless you discard a card. {2}: Masticore deals 1 damage to target creature. {2}: Regenerate Masticore.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Masticore unless you discard a card. {2}: Masticore deals 1 damage to target creature. {2}: Regenerate Masticore.

trans-unit.source: Memory Jar
trans-unit.target: Memory Jar

trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice Memory Jar: Each player exiles all cards from his or her hand face down and draws seven cards. At the beginning of the next end step, each player discards his or her hand and returns to his or her hand each card he or she exiled this way.
trans-unit.target: {T}, Sacrifice Memory Jar: Each player exiles all cards from his or her hand face down and draws seven cards. At the beginning of the next end step, each player discards his or her hand and returns to his or her hand each card he or she exiled this way.

trans-unit.target: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may pay {3}. If you do, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

trans-unit.source: Mox Diamond
trans-unit.target: Mox Diamond

trans-unit.source: If Mox Diamond would enter the battlefield, you may discard a land card instead. If you do, put Mox Diamond onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard. {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: If Mox Diamond would enter the battlefield, you may discard a land card instead. If you do, put Mox Diamond onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard. {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
